description: The DTA410 antenna from August, the portable digital television specialists, is designed specifically for digital reception. With a standard coaxial connection, it can be easily used with almost any portable or living room television set.Small, compact and lightweight, it is perfect for portable TVs and USB TV tuners; you can easily carry it in your laptop bag or TV case without worrying about extra weight or space. Its magnetic base attaches to large metal objects, using their surface area to enhance the reception quality.Capable of receiving frequencies of VHF 170-230MHz and UHF 470-869MHz it is ideal for both Digital ATSC and DAB broadcasting.Whether you are looking for an aerial for your bedroom, kitchen, caravan, boat or car, the DTA410 will greatly improve your reception in almost any circumstance.Please Note:DTV reception is dependent upon environmental factors, we cannot guarantee reception in all conditions. For more information, please consult the Digital Television website.New product supplied retail packaged with 12 month warranty.
title: August DTA410 Digital TV Antenna - Portable Indoor/Outdoor Aerial for USB TV Tuner / Digital Television / DAB Radio - With Screw Fix Wall Mount
